Package com.agenarisk.api.model

Class State

java.lang.Object
com.agenarisk.api.model.State
public class State extends Object
Node class corresponds to a State in AgenaRisk Desktop or ExtendedState in AgenaRisk Java API v1.
Author:
Eugene Dementiev

  • Method Details

    • createState

      protected static State createState(Node node, String label) throws StateException
      Creates a State instance for the given Node with the given Label.
      Will not create an underlying logic state if one already exists with this label for the associated logic node.
      Parameters:
      node - State's Node
      label - State's label (or string representation of corresponding range in format :lower - upper)
      Returns:
      State instance
      Throws:
      StateException - if numeric values in the label could not be parsed or range's upper bound is smaller than its lower bound

    • getState

      protected static State getState(Node node, String label)
      Find a state by given label in the given Node's underlying logic node.
      Parameters:
      node - Node to get the state from
      label - label of the required state
      Returns:
      state with given label or null if such state does not exist

    • getLabel

      public String getLabel()
      Gets the state's label.
      Returns:
      state's label

    • getNode

      public Node getNode()
      Gets the state's Node.
      Returns:
      state's Node

    • getLogicState

      public uk.co.agena.minerva.model.extendedbn.ExtendedState getLogicState()
      Deprecated.
      Will be affected by module architecture in the future and should not be used.
      Returns the underlying API1 State object.
      Returns:
      underlying logic state

    • computeLabel

      public static String computeLabel(uk.co.agena.minerva.model.extendedbn.ExtendedNode en, uk.co.agena.minerva.model.extendedbn.ExtendedState es)
      Computes a label for a logical state.
      Returns a range if the node is not Ranked and the state has an associated range. The range is in format: lower - upper.
      Otherwise returns state short name.
      Parameters:
      en - node containing the state
      es - logical state
      Returns:
      computed node label

    • setLogicState

      protected void setLogicState(uk.co.agena.minerva.model.extendedbn.ExtendedState logicState)
      Links this State to an underlying API1 State object. Should only be used while wrapping a new Model around the Minerva Model.
      Parameters:
      logicState - the logical state

      public String toString()
      Overrides:
